channel.title: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client
channel.description:
Sorry if this is in the wrong section, didn't know where to put it.
Ok, whenever i try and run a client i get an error. one is "Could not find the path specified" and the other is a biggy.
Error: exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderrer: client caused by : java.lang.classnotfound.exception cliend at java.net.urlclassloader$1.run<unknown source> at java.security.accesscontroller.doprivileged<native method at java.net.urlclassloader.findclass<unknown source> at sun.misc.luancher$appclassloader.loadclass<unknown source> at java.land.classloader.loadclass <unknown source> at java.lang.classloader.loadclassinternal<unknown source> could not find main class: client. program will now exit.
Halp?

item.title: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client
item.dc:creator: @Uberkist Uberkist
item.description:
@Uberkist wrote:

its not MY client…

Read full topic

item.title: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

relmitos:

Read what i said. Client is not the main class, GUI is.

No, his client doesn’t have a client class. That’s what the error says.

Read full topic
item.source: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client

item.title: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client
item.dc:creator: @Uberkist Uberkist
item.description:
@Uberkist wrote:

I may just be stubborn, but im saying if i were to try to connect to a server and it requires a client to play, when i download and run the client that happens.

Read full topic

item.title: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

First off, does your server have a GUI.java file? If so, then the client is not the main class.

Try using this run.bat

@echo off java -Xmx1024m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Read full topic
item.source: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client

item.title: I Get An Errer When i Try And launch a client
item.dc:creator: @Uberkist Uberkist
item.description:
@Uberkist wrote:

Sorry if this is in the wrong section, didn’t know where to put it.

Ok, whenever i try and run a client i get an error. one is “Could not find the path specified” and the other is a biggy.

Error:
exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdeffounderrer: client
caused by : java.lang.classnotfound.exception cliend
at java.net.urlclassloader$1.run
at java.security.accesscontroller.doprivileged<native method
at java.net.urlclassloader.findclass
at sun.misc.luancher$appclassloader.loadclass
at java.land.classloader.loadclass
at java.lang.classloader.loadclassinternal
could not find main class: client. program will now exit.

Halp?
